parameters.name: dynamicTarget
parameters.shortdesc: A page item target that is an animation, media, or mso. Can accept: PageItem, Graphic, Behavior or MediaItem.

parameters.name: delaySeconds
parameters.shortdesc: The time delay in seconds for a target. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new TimingTarget (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the TimingTarget.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the TimingTarget with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the TimingTargets within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The TimingTarget, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TimingTarget, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The TimingTarget, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TimingTarget, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first TimingTarget in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last TimingTarget in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle TimingTarget in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TimingTarget with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the TimingTarget that follows the desired TimingTarget.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TimingTarget whose index follows the specified TimingTarget in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The TimingTarget whose index comes before the desired TimingTarget.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any TimingTarget in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every TimingTarget in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TimingTarget.
Returns the TimingTarget with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
